LocationsMenu.Failed to retrieve: Failed to retrieve your location. Please change the permission for retrieving GPS data, or move to somewhere outdoor and stay for seconds.
LocationsMenu.Point camera: Point your camera to the scene shown in the picture above.
LocationsMenu.Move here and wait: Move to this place and you will be able to see the paintings in seconds.
LocationsMenu.Please reload: If nothing changes after moving, please reload the page.
